original_text:
He makes my feet like the feet of a deer;
    he causes me to stand on the heights.
korean_text: 나의 발을 암사슴 발 같게 하시며 나를 나의 높은 곳에 세우시며

sentences.original_text: He makes my feet like the feet of a deer
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내 발을 사슴의 발 같게 만드시며

sentences.original_text: he causes me to stand on the heights
